page.title: 11PARADISE HOUSE
page.content: Paradise House was built in the 17th century, and in 1976 it ws given to a trust by the baroness who wanted it to be a home for the handicapped: it is now a residential home for mentally handicapped. THe stone back to the house is 17th century and the front is an extension. At present, they are housing about 27 students aged 16 to 24, and 18 staff. All students have a house parent who gets them up about 7.30 for a song and bible reading at 7.55. Breakfast is at 8.00, then they help clean the house until lesson time. The students aged 16 to 18 have lessons: they do art, modelling, painting, reading, writing and in the afternoon they do crafts.
